itunes:title: EPISODE 300: Elon Musk’s Private Speech at Twitter Headquarters w/Libby Emmons
title: EPISODE 300: Elon Musk’s Private Speech at Twitter Headquarters w/Libby Emmons
description:
In this episode of Human Events Daily, Jack Posobiec is joined by Libby Emmons once again! They dialogue deep into the Twitter employee backlash — are they just entitled adult-children upset that Elon might force them to do actual work instead of enjoying their “office” daycares all day? Then, Jack and Libby share their wishes for the new Twitter, including the banned accounts they want to see reinstated, how Twitter can improve functionality of the site, and so much more!

Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


To get 20% off the 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ when you go to www.PrepareWithPOSO.com, no promo code required
